entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
